message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $800000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can't justify spending $800000 on it at this time. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $750000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your concerns, but I'm still looking to get a better price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $850000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I still feel that $850000 is a bit steep given my current budget constraints. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $800000. I hope this is within your consideration.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make one more concession. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than $825000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you. I'm willing to meet you halfway between your offer and my previous offer.

Thank you for your continued willingness to negotiate, Alice. I appreciate your effort to find a mutually beneficial solution. Given your latest offer, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $820000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
